title: What can I do with a PROJECT Blue print for a skin I have
body: So I got a Blueprint for PROJECT Leona, but I have that skin. With normal skin shards I know I can disenchant it but no option for the blueprint exists, just the option to forge for 11 project cores and that is it. Does anyone know if there is a way to get rid of it without forging it?

replies.body:
*TheImmortalNova* is correct here. After the PROJECT: DISRUPTION event ends, you'll be given the opportunity to disenchant leftover materials into a bit of essence if you wish to clean up your inventory. 

Check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) for complete details on the event.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Z3ZAA8JR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-10T22:31:42.081+0000)
>
> *TheImmortalNova* is correct here. After the PROJECT: DISRUPTION event ends, you'll be given the opportunity to disenchant leftover materials into a bit of essence if you wish to clean up your inventory. 
> 
> Check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) for complete details on the event.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Do you have the breakdowns of the essences you'll get breaking down through the components after the event ends? Like should I use my cores for crafting the blueprint for a Project skin for a champ I don't own to break down into essence, or will the combined essences from the 11 cores and blueprint be worth more?

I don't have any information as to exactly what values or types of essence they will break down to at this time. I recommend keeping an eye on [NEWS](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) in case it gets announced there.
I remember them saying you could do this after the event... can't remember where I read it though
